item.title: Scientific analysis servers
item.description:
Intro  

Once you have logged on to one of the login servers you can then ssh to a scientific analysis (sci) server to do your work. The sci servers are not directly accessible outside the firewall of RAL (JASMIN’s host instution) so most users will need to access them via a login server.
